extendedInfo.description: Winner of a 2012 Popular Mechanics Editors Choice AwardDayco, a leader in the research, design, manufacturing and distribution of a broad range of belts, tensioners and pulleys for the automotive, trucking, construction, agricultural and industrial markets, introduces the âDayco Appâ for mobile and tablet devices.Using state-of-the-art scan technology, scan your VIN with the smartphoneâs built-in camera for immediate access to a complete list of Dayco parts that match your vehicles year, make, and model.Whether you are a professional mechanic, do-it-yourselfer, or work in a retail location, you can also search Dayco parts by category, manually entering the VIN number, or referencing saved vehicles under My Searches. You can also enter another companyâs part number and find the Dayco part equivalent. If you have a Dayco part and need specs, routing instructions, or brochures, simply enter the Dayco part number for an instant list.For those that need to visit or call a retail location, click the Where to Buy tab and find a location near you. The Learning Center provides multiple resources for belts, tensioners, and hose applications. Make a quick call or send an email to Dayco at the tap of a button.The Dayco app is simple to use, offers comprehensive tools for every need, and the results are immediate. Application information is provided for auto and light trucks, ATVs and snowmobiles, heavy duty, hydraulic, industrial, and lawn and grounds.Some known issues are as follows: - 4.1 Jelly Bean: users may have some difficulty with the VIN scanner on certain devices. - 2.2 Froyo: maps do not load because this version of Android cannot render SVG (scalable vector graphics).  Our recommendation is that 2.2 Froyo users upgrade their software.

reviews.title: Galaxy note
reviews.comment: Unable to focus with bar scanner.
reviews.author: josh evans

reviews.title: Update Successful!
reviews.comment: It didn\'t load initially due to the hosting server being too small for demand. It now works just like it says. Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need support for next-gen PHONES!
reviews.comment: This app sounds nice if it worked with next generation phones. Honestly, who still has an iPhone 4s the future is here. Need support for HTC Droid DNA
reviews.author: Toamaius D\'Vignir

reviews.title: Need the scanner for note 2
reviews.comment: Scanner doesn\'t work. Very glitchy. Heard great things about the app. Could really use it. Please fix!!!
reviews.author: Brandon Draughn

reviews.title: Fails on current JB -  AOSP
reviews.comment: Loads, but functions do not work on Nexus 4
reviews.author: Stephen Swanson

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: This app is useless. First of all nothing fits the screen. This hasn\'t been an issue with Android literally in years. Secondly it has no way to take pictures of the Vin. This is awful. More Android devices than iOS developers!! Understand where the customer vase is at. Its with Android!! Get your **** together.
reviews.author: Fernando Gonzalez

reviews.title: Great app if it worked properly:(
reviews.comment: Awesome app for iOS users! Excellent functionality, content and ease of use. Scan option does not work properly for Android. BIG negative which will cause Android users to delete app.
reviews.author: Michael Rushman

reviews.title: Hope it works oneday
reviews.comment: Some one really needs to work on this app. It keep telling me to turn on 3/4g or WiFi even though there already on. I have no doubt that this will be a great accessory to have for many of us mechanics and parts changers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better
reviews.comment: New update works with Droid bionic with ics. Useful app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good products. Bad app
reviews.comment: Information is inaccurate for several applications.  Back button closes app instead of going back.  Scan function don\'t bring up correct factory information.  I demonstrated issues to the dealer that demonstrated the app at our shop and he didn\'t seem to think that inaccurate information was important and that was just a fluke.
reviews.author: Robert Schesel

reviews.title: Doesn\'t do all it promised & buggy
reviews.comment: I\'m a professional tech and was told by a rep that you can scan vin numbers, doesn\'t work on my galaxy s3.  Also is very buggy. Have to push selections multiple time as was as hitting the back button numerous times before it will exit.
reviews.author: tony walsh

reviews.title: Fix please.
reviews.comment: Worked great on my blackberry but I updated to a Note now barcode scanner doesnt work.
reviews.author: Theresa Worley

reviews.title: Automan
reviews.comment: Won\'t scan anything on my EVO 4g LTE. Only manual enter vin#
reviews.author: Jim Walborn Jr

reviews.title: Great app for a busy shop!
reviews.comment: This app is great for a busy shop. Scan the VIN and you have access to all the dayco parts info for that particular vehicle.
reviews.author: keith leadbetter

reviews.title: Galaxy s3
reviews.comment: The bar code scanner does not work on s3 fix it and you will get a better rating. For now useless. ...... ..!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.comment: What a great app!

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Great app! very user friendly.
